channel.title: I Need Help With Compiler.Bat
channel.description:
When I Clicked On Compile.Bat It Said The Following:
Please choose an option below to do that function. Keep posted on Moparscape Tutorials Section For any updates that I post.
c - Compile your server. r - To run your server. e - To exit out of the program. jar - It will create your server into a executable Jar Archive. Color - Change the text and background colors of this compiler. reset - Resets your Compiler Logs.
Option:(I typed " C ") and it said :
You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0.Go to Mod Taharok's Tutorial on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for step-by-step instructions like to download the newest JDK Update.
_______________________________________________________________
I Did that and installed Java Again and still it said the same thing.
anybody can help??

item.title: I Need Help With Compiler.Bat
item.dc:creator: @I_max_out_I I max out I
item.description:
@I_max_out_I wrote:

bump.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2007, 05:22:11 PM[/size][hr].

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Help With Compiler.Bat
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

are you using the “perfect compiler 1.9”?
if you are using the latest version of java which i’m assuming you are(6.1), then the older versions of the compiler won’t recognize that you have it.

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Help With Compiler.Bat
item.dc:creator: @Killed_By_Squirrel Killed By Squirrel
item.description:
@Killed_By_Squirrel wrote:

You have to extract your source from winRar to your desktop or documents so its editable.

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Help With Compiler.Bat
item.dc:creator: @newton37 newton37
item.description:
@newton37 wrote:

your probably using winrar…
try opening your source in a “folder”
use winrar just to extract the source[br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2007, 04:02:25 PM[/size][hr]ohhhhh i know now… lolz[br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2007, 04:04:21 PM[/size][hr]Here click this link and download JDK6u1

http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

then once you get that download, install, and you should see a notepad or wordpad file on your desktop that starts with “hs”…
drag that to your source folder and then you should compile fine. ;D
hope it works. good luck on the server.

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Help With Compiler.Bat
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Right click the compiler, then edit. Then delete everything inside it and replace it with this @echo off javac *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Help With Compiler.Bat
item.dc:creator: @I_max_out_I I max out I
item.description:
@I_max_out_I wrote:

When I Clicked On Compile.Bat It Said The Following:

Please choose an option below to do that function.
Keep posted on Moparscape Tutorials Section For
any updates that I post.

c - Compile your server.
r - To run your server.
e - To exit out of the program.
jar - It will create your server into a executable Jar Archive.
Color - Change the text and background colors of this compiler.
reset - Resets your Compiler Logs.

Option:(I typed " C ") and it said :

You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0.Go to Mod Taharok’s Tutorial
on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for step-by-step instructions
like to download the newest JDK Update.
